about_the_game:
When a cult disrupted the peace 200 years ago by summoning terrible creatures, they couldn't reverse their mistake!

Gather resources, Explore the abandoned Island and battle the curse with your friends before it takes over your home!

Key Features:

Enter the world of a small squirrel and explore the island while gathering resources to survive!
Find a way to reverse the terrible curse while battling the creatures that plague the island.


  • Gather resources and items
  • Build your home and craft items to aid you in your journey
  • Explore the abandoned town and unravel the misteries of a long forgotten cult
  • Find a way to cure the island from this terrible curse
